org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.list
Class AeProcessFilterAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.list.AeProcessFilterAdapter
public class AeProcessFilterAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

Wraps the AeProcessFilter to encapsulate selection criteria. Since this version is only used for the AeInMemoryProcessManager, we will get the entire collection of processes in the system.

          Returns true if the filter has no completion date start criterion.
protected  boolean isAfterCreationStartDate(IAeBusinessProcess aProcess)
          Returns true if the filter has no creation start date criteria, otherwise, returns true if the process start date is after the filter creation start date.

          Returns true if the filter has no completion end date criterion.

          Returns true if the filter has no creation end date criteria, otherwise, returns true if the process start date is before the filter creation end date.

          Returns true if the local part for the filter and the process are a match.

          Returns true if the process meets the filter selection criteria.

          Returns true if filter has no ns criteria otherwise returns true if the ns strings match.

Parameters:

isAfterCompletionStartDate

protected boolean isAfterCompletionStartDate(IAeBusinessProcess aProcess)
Returns true if the filter has no completion date start criterion. If criteria is set it returns false if the process has no end date. Otherwise, returns true if the process end date is after the filter completion start date.

Parameters:
aProcess -

isBeforeCompletionEndDate

protected boolean isBeforeCompletionEndDate(IAeBusinessProcess aProcess)
Returns true if the filter has no completion end date criterion. If criteria is set it returns false if the process has no end date. Otherwise, returns true if the process end date is before the filter completion end date.

Parameters:
aProcess -
